item.title: Mostafa add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Mostafa add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Mostafa add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Mostafa add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "You cannot find peace by avoiding life." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Mostafa add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "There is nothing to writing. All you do is sit down at a typewriter and bleed." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Mostafa add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "What really knocks me out is a book that, when you're all done reading it, you wish the author that wrote it was a terrific friend of yours and you could call him up on the phone whenever you felt like it. That doesn't happen much, though." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Mostafa add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "There are two basic motivating forces: fear and love. When we are afraid, we pull back from life. When we are in love, we open to all that life has to offer with passion, excitement, and acceptance. We need to learn to love ourselves first, in all our glory and our imperfections. If we cannot love ourselves, we cannot fully open to our ability to love others or our potential to create. Evolution and all hopes for a better world rest in the fearlessness and open-hearted vision of people who embrace life." -- John Lennon

item.title: Mostafa add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Mostafa add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "I'm sick of just liking people. I wish to God I could meet somebody I could respect." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Mostafa add a quote by J. D. Salinger
item.description: "Don't ever tell anybody anything. If you do, you start missing everybody." -- J. D. Salinger

item.title: Mostafa add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "The fact is always obvious much too late, but the most singular difference between happiness and joy is that happiness is a solid and joy a liquid." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Mostafa add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "My one regret in life is that I am not someone else." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Mostafa add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "Confidence is what you have before you understand the problem." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Mostafa add a quote by صادق هدایت
item.description: "اگر زندگانی سپری نمی شد چقدر تلخ و ترسناک بود." -- صادق هدایت

item.title: Mostafa add a quote by جلال آل احمد \ jalal ale ahmad
item.description: "ماها تو این زندکی تنگمون هی پاهامون به هم میپیچه و رو سر و کولِ هم زمین میخوریم . و خیال میکنیم تقصیر اون یکیه . غافل از اینکه این زندگیمونه که تنگه و ماها رو به جون همدیگه میندازه" -- جلال آل احمد \ jalal ale ahmad

item.title: Mostafa add a quote by مصطفی مستور
item.description:
"حرف كه مي‌زني من از هراس طوفان زل مي‌زنم به ميز به زيرسيگاري به خودكار تا باد مرا نبرد به آسمان. لبخند كه مي‌زني من ـ عين هالوها ـ زل مي‌زنم به دست‌هات به ساعت مچي طلايي‌ات به آستين پيراهن ا‌ت تا فرو نروم در زمين.
ديشب مادرم گفت تو از ديروز فرورفته‌اي در كلمه‌اي انگار در عین در شين درقاف در نقطه‌ها." -- مصطفی مستور

item.title: Mostafa add a quote by مصطفی مستور
item.description: "اگر دریچه ی دانستن رو مسدود کنیم رستگار میشیم" -- مصطفی مستور
